role: Application Solution Consultant (APAC Training Lead, QA Lead) - Play Partnership Team
summary:
Provided comprehensive solutions for partner developers to revamp their mobile applications to better optimize on Android platform.
- Conducted in-depth UX, localization, and accessibility consultations for applications to present custom solutions and adopt local market representing engagement, retention, culturalization, peer set review, Android vital, and others.
- Manipulated and analyzed internal data for monthly business review and program statistics using Google Apps Script and SQL.
- Automated internal work with Google Apps Script and SQL that affected team efficiency improvement. 
  * Auto-sending regular emails to respective recipients
  * Converting summarized data to emails 
  * Time-based database auto-refreshing connected to Google documents services and internal dataset
  * Retrieving all comments from Google documents services
- Managed knowledge alignment across global regions to drive efficient internal processes and communication with clients. Training lead of APAC team of 40+.
- Guided partners to enhance functionality and compatibility based on Google featuring guidelines.

Executed functional exploratory cycles, functional test case executions, and usability studies of well-known applications and websites. Reported reproducible bugs, crashes, and UX/UI suggestions. 
* Major apps tested: Facebook, Facebook Messenger, Instagram, Canva

Archive internship at OBS during PyeongChang 2018 Winter Olympic. Assisted the archive team to create and manage live footage.
- Live session video logging
- Making-of quality control
- Interviews translation
